DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double blind , placebo control , single ascend dose study assess safety , tolerability , PK , PD IE metformin follow single oral dose DA-1241 healthy male subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Evaluate The Safety , Tolerability , PK PD Of DA-1241 In Healthy Male Subjects
